summary: Mererek Stormcloak is a beautiful nord women, a woman who fights for her homeland. She visited some friends, and was caught when she traveled back to Skyrim. She chose after the escape from death, to fight for her homeland.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/u76bDB2.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LPeAn1x.jpg[/img]
Mererek Stormcloak is a beautiful nord women, a woman who fights for her homeland. She visited some friends, and was caught when she traveled back to Skyrim. She chose after the escape from death, to fight for her homeland. She is blind, but fighting with all of her senses. She love pretty things, and can not keep her hands off it.
[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/MKz6vH3.jpg[/img]

If you won't her to look like Mererek Stormcloak, you need:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D10168%26preview%3D&pUp=1]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/?]Coverwomen[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
author: MissRattata
